query: Can you create a 5-day travel plan for 2 people, leaving from Miami to visit 2 cities in California between March 26th and March 30th, 2022? We have a budget of $5,800. We require accommodations to be non-shared rooms and they must be pet-friendly, as we are bringing our pets. We would prefer not to self-drive during our trip.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[San Francisco,Los Angeles]
